content.text: [W]Use this form to apply to amend the ET3 response.
[W]The tribunal will decide if you can make the amendment by judging the fairness of the application. This decision may be made at a hearing.
[W]The tribunal also needs to know if you consider the amendment minor or substantial.
[W]Providing details of why you want to amend the response and the importance of the amendment will help the tribunal to decide your application more quickly.
